law.catch_line: A ground lease holder shall register a ground lease with the Department by submitting:...

text.section:
A ground lease holder shall register a ground lease with the Department by submitting:
A registration form that the Department requires; and
The registration fee for each ground lease as provided under subsection (c) of this section.

The registration fee for a ground lease per ground lease holder is:
$10 for the first ground lease; and
$5 for each additional ground lease.
